thread.title: 23 Perfect Thoughts Tumblr Has Had About The Weasleys
thread.title_full: 23 Perfect Thoughts Tumblr Has Had About The Weasleys

author: Hannah Jewell
title: 23 Perfect Thoughts Tumblr Has Had About The Weasleys
text:
View this image ›
accio-shitpost.tumblr.com ID: 10394666 2. And this amazing look into her thought process: View this image ›
jasico.tumblr.com ID: 10394588 3. This idea that explains a lot: View this image ›
sapphireswimming.tumblr.com ID: 10394611 4. This reminder of what amazing parents Arthur and Molly were: https://hpandcarbs.tumblr.com/post/138056010862/molly-and-arthur-weasley-raised-seven-kids-on-one View this embed ›
ID: 10394613 5. This post that shows how Percy grows as a person (you’re still allowed to think he’s a prick though): https://cerellelannister.tumblr.com/post/100693164165/how-percy-weasleys-growth-as-a-character-is-shown View this embed ›
ID: 10394615 6. This accurate vision of Ginny as a parent: View this image ›
bisexualdinahlance.tumblr.com ID: 10394640 7. And these even more accurate of the twins if they had the internet: View this image ›
accio-shitpost.tumblr.com ID: 10394643 8. This inspiration for some excellent fanart, because how dare they: View this image ›
pidgishly.tumblr.com ID: 10394644 9. This look at the whole series from Molly’s point of view: https://hpandcarbs.tumblr.com/post/133837284332/molly-weasley-and-the-year-her-brothers-died View this embed ›
ID: 10394583 10. This amazing fact about Tonks and the older Weasley boys: View this image ›
ix-mmi.tumblr.com ID: 10394659 11. This fact about names that proves how lovely the Weasleys are: View this image ›
accio-shitpost.tumblr.com ID: 10394607 12. …Despite this very ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ choice: View this image ›
accio-shitpost.tumblr.com ID: 10394663 13. This plot point that doesn’t add up, or maybe it does: View this image ›
gonnaslapaboo.tumblr.com ID: 10394603 14. This trick of the eye: https://phyerfly.tumblr.com/post/63128800744/i-didnt-see-it-at-first View this embed ›
ID: 10394668 15. This inspiration to knitters everywhere: View this image ›
faserkind.tumblr.com ID: 10394670 16. And this one: View this image ›
thefutureauthor.tumblr.com ID: 10394704 17. This reminder that Molly is a hardened killer when she needs to be: View this image ›
accio-shitpost.tumblr.com ID: 10394673 18. This quick way to lighten your mood: View this image ›
geekybombshell.tumblr.com ID: 10394675 19. This reminder of how wonderful Arthur is: View this image ›
nekobemura.tumblr.com ID: 10394701 20. And this one: https://imaginesharrypotter.tumblr.com/post/152737990558/request View this embed ›
ID: 10394703 21. This perfect new year’s resolution: View this image ›
accio-shitpost.tumblr.com ID: 10394549 22. This funny thought that actually makes no sense because Fred didn’t die, no siree, didn’t happen: View this image ›
the-doctors-clotpole.tumblr.com ID: 10394598 23. And this easy way to feel better about yourself: View this image ›

Hannah Jewell is a senior staff writer for BuzzFeed News and is based in London.
